sqlMap.select: SELECT Holiday_name holidayName, to_char(to_date(begin_ymdh, 'yyyymmddhh24'), 'yyyymmddhh24miss') beginTime, to_char(to_date(end_ymdh, 'yyyymmddhh24'), 'yyyymmddhh24miss') endTime FROM cHoliday_unstop_new WHERE Region_code = #REGION_CODE# AND ilevel = #CREDIT_CLASS# AND to_char(SYSDATE + 3, 'yyyymmddhh24') BETWEEN begin_ymdh AND end_ymdh AND to_char(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmddhh24') < begin_ymdh AND rownum <= 1
